message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement. Let me propose a price of $14000 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Can you meet me halfway?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your offer. In order to find a mutually beneficial solution, I would like to propose a price of $13500 for the product.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13200. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob. To reach an agreement, I am willing to consider a price of $13300 for the product.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12000 and $13300. Can you consider a price of $12650?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer the product at $12800.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $12500. Can you meet me at this price?
Considering our ongoing negotiations, I am willing to offer the product at $12650.
I'm really close to my budget, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $12500. If you can meet me at this price, I'll make the deal.
